name: Dungeoneer Demo
description:
"Journey through the Dungeon oh brave Adventurer! But be careful, danger awaits at every turn!"

*This is a Demo of a Pre-Alpha game*

This is an early prototype for a game I have been conceptualizing for a few years. I made one attempt at creating it, but I lost the game file because I am an idiot. So now I am trying to recreate it while improving and simplifying it along the way. I hope you enjoy!

(The demo is about 10-30 minutes of gameplay)
